1503.verse: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ|And O my people!|137|146|8445$مَن|Who|50|68|76$يَنصُرُنِى|would help me|114|132|8448$مِنَ|against|68|86|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|71|606$إِن|if|44|62|225$طَرَدتُّهُمْ‌ۚ|I drove them away?|152|161|8449$أَفَلَا|Then, will not|110|332|452$تَذَكَّرُونَ|you take heed?|122|344|6186$

1504.verse: وَلَآ|And not|72|81|25$أَقُولُ|I say|66|83|5612$لَكُمْ|to you|63|80|207$عِندِى|(that) with me|117|134|5609$خَزَآئِنُ|(are the) treasures|147|164|5610$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|103|606$وَلَآ|and not|71|80|25$أَعْلَمُ|I know|64|73|324$ٱلْغَيْبَ|the unseen,|99|117|5611$وَلَآ|and not|71|89|25$أَقُولُ|I say|66|84|5612$إِنِّى|that I am|82|100|312$مَلَكٌ|an Angel,|82|100|5436$وَلَآ|and not|71|89|25$أَقُولُ|I say|66|75|5612$لِلَّذِينَ|for those whom|123|133|750$تَزْدَرِىٓ|look down upon|123|143|8450$أَعْيُنُكُمْ|your eyes,|90|110|8451$لَن|never|57|77|524$يُؤْتِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ|will Allah give them|146|166|8452$خَيْرًا‌ۖ|any good.|86|96|1388$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|61|2323$أَعْلَمُ|knows best|95|110|324$بِمَا|what|53|68|43$فِىٓ|(is) in|58|73|89$أَنفُسِهِمْ‌ۖ|their souls.|93|108|1025$إِنِّىٓ|Indeed, I|80|95|312$إِذًا|then|50|65|1317$لَّمِنَ|(will be) surely of|135|143|1196$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers."|133|133|377$

1505.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|103|101$يَـٰنُوحُ|"O Nuh!|75|103|8453$قَدْ|Indeed,|70|98|1097$جَـٰدَلْتَنَا|you disputed with us|158|186|8454$فَأَكْثَرْتَ|and you (have been) frequent|220|234|8455$جِدَٲلَنَا|(in) dispute with us.|154|161|8456$فَأْتِنَا|So bring us|94|108|6521$بِمَا|what|53|67|43$تَعِدُنَآ|you threaten us (with),|176|190|6522$إِن|if|44|58|225$كُنتَ|you are|70|84|1281$مِنَ|of|50|57|156$ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ|the truthful."|113|113|5400$

1506.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|81|309$إِنَّمَا|"Only|55|72|102$يَأْتِيكُم بِهِ|will bring it (on) you|153|170|5601$ٱللَّهُ|Allah,|56|73|2323$إِن|if|44|61|225$شَآءَ|He wills,|74|91|2277$وَمَآ|and not|71|88|46$أَنتُم|you (are)|82|90|796$بِمُعْجِزِينَ|one who (can) escape (it).|200|200|6062$

1509.verse: وَأُوحِىَ|And it was revealed|151|158|5474$إِلَىٰ|to|53|67|118$نُوحٍ|Nuh,|60|74|4641$أَنَّهُۥ|"That|62|76|2697$لَن|will never|82|96|524$يُؤْمِنَ|believe|72|86|8466$مِن|from|50|64|53$قَوْمِكَ|your people|97|104|8467$إِلَّا|except|65|72|86$مَن|(those) who|101|115|76$قَدْ|have already|105|119|1097$ءَامَنَ|believed.|79|93|111$فَلَا|So (do) not|97|111|208$تَبْتَئِسْ|(be) distressed|120|134|8468$بِمَا|by what|74|81|43$كَانُواْ|they have been|124|356|94$يَفْعَلُونَ|doing.|87|319|695$

1510.verse: وَٱصْنَعِ|And construct|114|134|8469$ٱلْفُلْكَ|the ship|73|114|8470$بِأَعْيُنِنَا|under Our Eyes,|126|167|8471$وَوَحْيِنَا|and Our inspiration|144|185|8472$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|124|25$تُخَـٰطِبْنِى|address Me|106|133|8473$فِى|concerning|92|146|89$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|143|20$ظَلَمُوٓاْ‌ۚ|wronged;|82|136|558$إِنَّهُم|indeed, they (are)|141|168|106$مُّغْرَقُونَ|the ones (to be) drowned."|201|201|8474$

1502.verse: And O my people, I ask not of you for it any wealth. My reward is not but from Allah. And I am not one to drive away those who have believed. Indeed, they will meet their Lord, but I see that you are a people behaving ignorantly.

1503.verse: And O my people, who would protect me from Allah if I drove them away? Then will you not be reminded?

1504.verse: And I do not tell you that I have the depositories [containing the provision] of Allah or that I know the unseen, nor do I tell you that I am an angel, nor do I say of those upon whom your eyes look down that Allah will never grant them any good. Allah is most knowing of what is within their souls. Indeed, I would then be among the wrongdoers."

1505.verse: They said, "O Noah, you have disputed us and been frequent in dispute of us. So bring us what you threaten us, if you should be of the truthful."

1506.verse: He said, "Allah will only bring it to you if He wills, and you will not cause [Him] failure.

1507.verse: And my advice will not benefit you - although I wished to advise you - If Allah should intend to put you in error. He is your Lord, and to Him you will be returned."

1508.verse: Or do they say [about Prophet Muhammad], "He invented it"? Say, "If I have invented it, then upon me is [the consequence of] my crime; but I am innocent of what [crimes] you commit."

1509.verse: And it was revealed to Noah that, "No one will believe from your people except those who have already believed, so do not be distressed by what they have been doing.

1510.verse: And construct the ship under Our observation and Our inspiration and do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are [to be] drowned."
